title: About Me
content: I'm a full-stack developer with over a decade of experience building fast, secure, and scalable web applications. My expertise lies in JavaScript and Node.js, with deep knowledge of modern front-end frameworks like React, Vue, and Svelte. Whether itâ€™s a dynamic web app or a high-performance static site, I focus on clean, maintainable code and thoughtful user experiences from front to back.
